result.reason: Implement configurable border size for UI elements, starting with connection tabs, to enhance user customization and accessibility.
result.approach: Add a new configuration setting for border thickness. Update DockPaneStripNG.cs to use this setting when creating Pen objects for drawing borders. Add a UI element in FrmOptions for users to modify this setting.
